name: Wavey Racey
description:
Hang out in the garden playing with a toy bunny in a paddling pool on a Jet Ski.

Set in the Universe of the Critically acclaimed Cozy Taxi, chill out, throw balls at traffic, and mess around with your toy remote control Jet Ski.

W, A, S, & D control the Jet Ski.

Press space to perform a sick stunt.

Mouse looks around.

Left click to throw balls.

Just chill out and enjoy!

Made in about 15 - 20 hours for Global Game Jam 2017.

https://twitter.com/OhCarson
